title: New client is bad..
body:
Riot fix client please it's so bad..
Not letting me login at all 
i am having to do updates and then the client doesn't respond after that..
So i have to re-update it..
which is annoying right now
Please fix new client

replies.body:
New client is not bad... Its awful. Its so much worse than the Legacy one... What the hell were they thinking when they decided to do it like that??
I know its beta and some features might still be coming but its lacking so many classic and basic features, like us being able to watch or winrates in every champion we played in ranked and not just our Top 4 or 5.
What dissapoints me the most is that when you go to your recently played folder on the friends list you cant even right click to block them... you have to send a friend request first if you forgot to block him on the ENd game lobby...
Its so so so bad. 
I dont mind the esthetics of it. I actually quite like it. But everything else is just awful compared to the old one...
Why did they bother with making a new client if they just make a shitty one?=??!
Im having the same issue, the new update is stuck at 99%! I can't play man. And the thing after the update, something to do with some command process didnt work either.
Now the patching iis stuck at 38%...

My patching actually finishes but then it doesnt respond..
then i have to reopen it cuz it didnt respond and then i had to reupdate..
kind of pissing me off right now
Happens to me every single patch and itâ€™s really irritating. Have you found a solution?

So someone in game ( right after i finally got through with the re-updates..) told me to click on launch legacy client and IT HELPED A LOT because now i don't have to go through all that process of closing and reopening the new client.
To Launch Legacy Client its at the bottom right of the new client.

i dont know why the had to change the client it was ok not a single thing is better not a single one and the design is  more like a tablet than a pc game why riot why i play this game since 2010 and this is the worst thing that ever happened to this game

I haven't had issues logging in.  I just find the new client to be very disorganized and missing many features (or they are hidden) that the old client had.  Like the recently played with in chat area.  Items sets.  Simple stuff.  It feels really clunky to use.

It sounds like the installation may not have updated properly, and may require a [reinstall](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).  You should also provide any additional feedback and steps you went through to reproduce this issue to the [client devs](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) over at the client discussion boards.  Good luck!
